name: fputchar
warnings: Using an invalid handle will crash your server! Get a valid handle by using fopen or ftemp.
description: Write one character to a file.

params_body.name: handle
params_body.description: The File handle to use, earlier opened by fopen().

params_body.name: value
params_body.description: The character to write into the file.
